attributes.action: ensure  increases in defence spending above the level of inflation that will allow all three services to provide up to date personal equipment, logistics and weapons systems (and means of delivering these weapons systems, i.e., ships, aircraft and military vehicles), that will maintain and improve the United Kingdom's international position and ensure minimum casualties in the event of conflict.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
